title: Pokemon Legends: Arceus reviews are in! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.26.22
description:
Blessing and Andy are joined by Laura Kate Dale who reviewed Pokemon Legends: Arceus! Let's talk about Pokemon, the next 3 Call of Duty games coming to PlayStation, and so much more.

Follow Laura on Twitter: https://twitter.com/LaurakBuzz

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:00 - Housekeeping
A new episode of Kinda Funny Gamescast is up right now and it’s our 2022 predictions. You can catch that on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.
And then a fun one for me: On Tuesday, February 8th I’m gonna be streaming some Rare Replay and also celebrating Black History Month in an Xbox Twitch takeover. You can tune into that on Twitch.tv/Xbox at noon pt.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers:
James Davis (@JamesDavisMakes),Black Jack, & Pranksy
The Roper Report  -
00:06:24 - Pokemon Legends: Arceus reviews are in!
00:24:10 - Do you think these review scores do have a bias to them because of it being a new pokemon game and not a remake? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:28:00 - Ad
00:33:15 - Uncharted: Legacy Of Thieves Collection Review round up
00:39:49 - Activision’s Next Three Call of Duty Games Will Be on PlayStation and Xbox - Jason Schreier @ Bloomberg
00:47:50 - Halo Infinite had the biggest launch in series history with ‘over 20 million players’ - Tom Ivan @ VGC
00:51:30 - Crytek reveals Crysis 4?? - Tom Phillips @ Eurogamer
00:56:01 - A sequel to the Mortal Kombat (2021) movie is in development - Mike Fleming Jr @ Deadline
01:01:40 - Out today
01:09:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Tim
